info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:02PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southeastern Saratoga and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Niskayuna, or near Schenectady, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Scotia, Mechanicville, Latham, Niskayuna, Green Island, Waterford, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Alplaus, East Glenville, Burnt Hills, Halfmoon, Malta, Stillwater and Schaghticoke. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 25. Interstate 890 between exits 4b and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 6 and 7, and between exits 8A and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
